channel.title: Helping peeps with silabsoft client with pics!
channel.description:
~helping with pics~ ~comment if this helps u plz!!~
ok ive been hearing this problem and it happened to mee to so i want to help pple solve this problem so.....pple when u open up silabsoft client it says this right. [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img234.imageshack.us/img234/6778/untitledza5.png[/img][/URL] well i found out that it is ur paths that r messin u up so heres the guide
Go to start menu on ur comp
go to computer right click then go to properties [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/4562/13129492pa8.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=502&i=13129492pa8.png][IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/4562/13129492pa8.ca2cda652a.jpg[/img][/URL]
then go to advanced then envirement variables
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/8237/71908678kh7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=502&i=71908678kh7.png][IMG]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/8237/71908678kh7.f9c34b4133.jpg[/img][/URL]
then ull see stuff that says path change the path to PATH and the code under it put this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;. then if u have a classpath there change it to CLASSPATH and put this code under it(if there is no classpath there just make 1) C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img234.imageshack.us/img234/7205/88142505lg1.png[/img][/URL] then save and ur done... =) hope this helped u!! now run ur silabsoft!!

item.title: Helping peeps with silabsoft client with pics!
item.dc:creator: @Tredog Tredog
item.description:
@Tredog wrote:

~helping with pics~ ~comment if this helps u plz!!~

ok ive been hearing this problem and it happened to mee to so i want to help pple solve this problem
so…pple when u open up silabsoft client it says this right.

well i found out that it is ur paths that r messin u up so
heres the guide

Go to start menu on ur comp

go to computer right click then go to properties

then go to advanced then envirement variables


then ull see stuff that says path change the path to PATH and the code under it put this
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.
then if u have a classpath there change it to CLASSPATH and put this code under it(if there is no classpath there just make 1)
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;.


then save and ur done… =) hope this helped u!! now run ur silabsoft!!

Read full topic
item.source: Helping peeps with silabsoft client with pics!
